SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_UMHS_INTERACTIONS
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Returns all the MIMED interactions for a patient
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: UM Dev
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL: CREATE FUNCTION DBO.USR_UFN_UMHS_INTERACTIONS(@UMHSID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER) RETURNS TABLE AS RETURN SELECT I.ID, DATE, ISC.DESCRIPTION STATUS, IC.NAME CATEGORY, SC.NAME SUBCATEGORY, SUMMARY, TC.DESCRIPTION CONTACTMETHOD FROM USR_UMHS_INTERACTION I LEFT JOIN USR_INTERACTION_STATUSCODE ISC ON ISC.ID = I.STATUSCODEID JOIN INTERACTIONCATEGORY IC ON IC.ID = I.INTERACTIONCATEGORYID JOIN INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORY SC ON SC.ID = I.INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYID JOIN INTERACTIONTYPECODE TC ON TC.ID = I.CONTACTMETHODCODEID WHERE UMHSID = @UMHSID
